rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with natural lighting and Vastu-optimized orientation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean living room with an open plan to connect with the dining area and kitchen, featuring large windows for ample daylight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for family meals and gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional Mediterranean kitchen with modern appliances and a central island.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Private entertainment space with soundproofing and ambient lighting, designed for optimal viewing experience.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom featuring Mediterranean decor and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Main Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures and sufficient ventilation.

openings.location: South facing wall of Living Room

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony and en-suite bathroom, designed in Mediterranean style.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom for the Master Bedroom with optimal ventilation and lighting.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A quiet study space with natural light and a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility
rooms.description: Functional storage area for household utilities and extra storage.

openings.description: Staircase leading to the rooftop terrace.
